hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: International directory enquiries newerahealthagency.com Genetic diseases and the mechanisms of aging are staggeringly complicated, as is theorizing and implementing a solution on a petri dish or, hopefully, a patient. I worked at Harvard and MIT researching cures for amyotrophic lateral sclerosis. Curing genetic-based diseases is like trying to retrofit the I-beams, electricity, elevators, ductwork, and security systems in a deteriorating skyscraper without interrupting anyone's workday.
